channel.title: Goals on PR
channel.description: Recent content in Goals on PR

item.title: Idea Vault: Prj - Dug Me
item.description: Task management app with little twist. Yep, Dug instead of clippy while nagging. Idea is to log all our project ideas similar to logging notes in nvALT.

item.title: Resolutions for 2012
item.description: For the first time in history, I am publishing resolution list online, let see if this helps. Shed at least 5kg weight The iPhone4s which can’t resist myself from buying should be the last gadget for the year.
